name: Helioptile
description: The Generator Pokémon. They make their home in deserts. They can generate their energy from basking in the sun, so eating food is not a requirement.

abilities.name: Dry Skin
abilities.description: At the end of each of this Pokémon's turns, it takes an amount of damage equal to its proficiency modifier in harsh sunlight, or heals for the same amount during rain.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to Sandstorm damage. In addition, its AC increases by 2 in desert terrain, or during a Sandstorm.

abilities.name: Solar Power
abilities.description: Damage rolls for this Pokémon get an additional +2 during harsh sunlight.
